xedra_evolved_innawoods.name: XedraWood: Stone and Sorcery
xedra_evolved_innawoods.description: Better blending for Xedra Evolved and Innawoods.  Also forms the core for a number of optional supplemental mods.

realdarkskies.name: Really Dark Skies
realdarkskies.description: A supplement mod that increments the Cataclysm Bright Nights experience by adding an inscrutable evil, extra-terrestrial humanoid paramilitary expeditionary force to your typical survival scenario. Complements to the vanilla adding the evil aliens 'The Xenoids', a regenerating, alternative style of zombies called 'Strays', and terrifyingly armored [REDACTED], and even expansions to old foes like Mi-Go's, and Triffids! Prepare for a challenge.

mindovermatter.name: Mind Over Matter
mindovermatter.description: Psionic powers for Cataclysm.  The Readme contains extensive information on how the process of gaining and using powers works, so make sure to check it if you're confused.
